title: Heart Hands
description:
Two hands forming a heart shape. Used to express love and support.

This emoji currently showns the heart being made through two hands being curved into a C-shape with their thumbs touching. This is stereotypically referred to as the "Millennial Hand Heart".
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the heart hands emoji is a masterclass in elegant simplicity, depicting two hands coming together to form a perfect, glowing red heart. Appleâ€™s signature 3D rendering gives the hands a tactile, realistic quality with smooth, rounded fingers and subtle shading that suggests soft skin. The heart itself is rendered with a brilliant, glossy finish and precise lighting, making it pop with emotion. This emoji on Apple devices is a universal symbol of love, care, and support, conveying empathy and heartfelt connection in digital conversations.
